title: Computational Fluid Dynamics
subtitle: Advanced numerical methods for fluid flow simulations
overview: Our CFD research focuses on developing next-generation numerical algorithms for complex fluid flow phenomena, including turbulence modeling, multiphase flows, and reactive flows. We work on both fundamental method development and practical applications in aerospace, automotive, and energy industries.

title: Bio-Immmmmnspired Robotics
subtitle: Designing terrain-adaptive robots based on nature
overview: This project explores legged robotics inspired by insects and animals to navigate complex terrain. Applications include disaster recovery, agriculture, and autonomous exploration.
